comments: Capable of document analysis, legal research and contracts, Evatt Al is the future of law. Through a unique encryption technology - it combines the intelligence of AI, with the security of private software.
features:
Making Lawyers' Lives Easier. 

Evatt AI is an AI Software for lawyers. Built using the world's most powerful AI, trained in the common law, and with access to 45 million cases through legal databases. Evatt AI can save you 2 hours per day.

Evatt AI is capable of:
Advanced Legal Research 
Contract Drafting
Document Review

title: Evatt AI
